::The Galactors::

The Flare/Scrap/Supernova jet avoids the shots as they leave the CF 
area, heading for Hell Beast's base with the Vycir/Slasys jet 
following behind.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: in spaceship mode Astroblast has twin laser cannons 2x1 
> shot.
> 
> Astroblast dodges the two missiles then, not knowing that there 
> are other jets, he takes three plasma blasts; his armour smoking 
> after the attack. When he regains his balance, he yells to Dead-
> End, "I need an area scan, something's here, I can't see it, and I 
> know that you can." He then fires four times at Flare/Scrap, 
looking 
> around warily.
